message.body: hi
Hi. Feeling better?
yea! all healed up. just need to do some follow up visits and take antibiotics how are you
I am good
it was so nice out today i spend the whole day outside hard to believe i was even in the hospital
Where do you live?
philadelphia you?
Oakland, CA
nice is it nice there
Yes. Weather wise it is perfect right now. Sunny and 75
wow! it was in the mid 90s here today and humid .its extreme weather wise here too hot or too cold!
Our problem is we have no sesaons here
that must be weird-what are your plans for tonight?
Just hanging out. You?
about to sleep now watched ted talks after dinner nothing too eventful baby is fast asleep that the best on a friday night
good morning
Good morning
im at work till 3 today. i work just couple days a week.
What do you do?
im front desk staff for a holistic health center a couple days a week. other than that i make paintings and sell them usually.
and am a full time mom. but im starting grad school is fall at which time i will probably have no time to make art
Wow thats a lot. What are you going to grad school for?
it sounds like more than it is. im going to study art therapy its like being a psychologist and using art as a tool to express and process emotions
and you what do you do?
Thats really interesting...what made you get into that?
i didn't think art teaching was for me after giving it a spin. 1st found out about art therapy when i was in high school volunteering at a hospital got t
o see an art therapist in action
